Error.InvalidTaskStatusForUpdateException: This action can only be performed when the task is pending or in progress
Error.InprogressTaskException: Only task status can be changed from pending to in progress
Error.RejectTaskException: only reject the subtask from pending staus or in progress status
Error.FinishSubtaskException: Only complete subtask from in progress status
Error.FinishParenttaskException: Only complete the parent task when the subtasks has been completed
Error.DeleteTaskException: Only delete the task that is in the pending state, no subtasks, and not the root task
Error.UnassignedTaskException: Please assign the task to anyone before taking this action
Error.AlreadyAssignedTaskException: The task has already been assigned, cannot be reassigned to others
Error.UserNotInProjectException: User is not part of the project
Error.InvalidExpiryDateSubtaskException: The expiry date of the child task is up to {{maxExpiryDate, datetime}}, cannot be greater than the expiry date of the parent task
